name: Geometry FiLL
description:
Geometry Fill is a fun casual game, where you fill the specific geometry shapes (geometry circle, square, triangle, ...) with color. You get points if you fill the shape between 50% and 100%. If you are below or over that, you get no points. If you get exactly 100%, you get DOUBLE points! This game tests your accuracy, reflexes and speed at the same time. Your time is limited at 30 seconds.

Try to get the best score possible and share it on the social media.

More geometry shapes can be added in future updates. Let me know about your ideas in the comments :)

Have fun,

Ranbarg Studios

Credits:

- Music by Coma-Media from Pixabay: https://pixabay.com/music/beats-this-science-abstract-12216/
